#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    int a,b,l;
    while(t--)
    {
              cin>>a>>b>>l;
              b=a+b;
              if((l%b)&&(l%b)<=a)
              cout<<"Aman"<<endl;
              else
              cout<<"Anish"<<endl;
              }
  
  return 0;  
    }
